text: The Afghan cricket team toured Scotland from 11–17 August 2010. The tour consisted of one Intercontinental Cup Match and two One Day Internationals (ODIs). ==Intercontinental Cup Match== ==ODI series== ===1st ODI=== ===2nd ODI=== ==References== ==External links== * Category:2010 in Afghan cricket Category:2010 in Scottish cricket Category:Afghan cricket tours of Scotland Category:International cricket competitions in 2010 Afghanistan 2010
title: Afghan cricket team in Scotland in 2010
